name: Granny Dahnie
description: A Wilder Tank wearing the Glimmerbloom equipment, who can absorb enemies' Energy and their Haste while taking damage.

ultimate.name: Threshold of Jade
ultimate.description: Granny Dahnie summons Parasitic Grass within 2 tiles for 3s. Every second, enemies within range cannot move or act and lose 25 Energy and at least 60% of her ATK as HP. The total amount of their lost HP is 130% of her ATK Granny Dahnie also recovers an equal amount of HP. She is unaffected while Parasitic Grass exists.

upgrades.upgrade: The total amount of enemies' lost HP is increased to 140% per second, and each enemy's minimum HP loss is increased to 65%.
The Energy loss per second of enemies in range is increased to 35.
The total amount of enemies' lost HP is increased to 150% per second, and each enemy's minimum HP loss is increased to 70%.
The total amount of enemies' lost HP is increased to 160% per second, and each enemy's minimum HP loss is increased to 75%.

skill_1.name: Seed Cannon
skill_1.description: When an enemy deals total damage equal to 15% of Granny Dahnie's max HP to her, Granny Dahnie shoots Parasitic Seeds at this enemy, dealing 120% damage and reducing their Haste by 40 for 6s.

skill_2.name: Angry Taunt
skill_2.description: Granny Dahnie taunts an enemy for 3s and instantly recovers 140% of her ATK as HP. This skill prioritizes the enemy who targets the weakest ally.

hero_focus.name: Hero Focus
hero_focus.description: Granny Dahnie increases her Vitality by 11 during battle. She gains an extra 3 Vitality while casting Threshold of Jade.

upgrades.upgrade: Granny Dahnie increases her Vitality by 15 during battle. She gains an extra 4 Vitality while casting Threshold of Jade.
Granny Dahnie increases her Vitality by 19 during battle. She gains an extra 5 Vitality while casting Threshold of Jade.

ex_skill.name: Glimmerbloon Blessings
ex_skill.description: When Granny Dahnie's HP ratio is lower than 50%, the Glimmerbloom Shield grows bigger, increasing her Phys DEF by 50% and Magic DEF by 50% and recovering 100% of her ATK as HP every second. The skill lasts 12s and can be cast once every battle.

upgrades.upgrade: Gains unaffected when skill takes effect.

enhance_force.name: Enhance Force
enhance_force.description: Recovers 120% of her ATK as HP when shooting seeds using Seed Cannon.

season_skill.name: Lock-on Projectiles
season_skill.description: Shoots a projectile at the target for every 2s your control effects last on that target, dealing 120% damage.
